description: Multi-company, multi-currency accounting application built on US GAAP principles

architecture.principle: Effect on server only. Pure React + generated fetch client on frontend.

backend.stack: Effect for type-safe business logic, @effect/sql for database, HttpApi for REST endpoints

frontend.stack: TanStack Start + React + Tailwind CSS + openapi-fetch client
frontend.state: React useState/useReducer for local state. Server state via loaders.
frontend.no_effect: NO Effect code in frontend. Plain fetch via generated openapi-fetch client.

api_client.tools: openapi-typescript generates types, openapi-fetch provides typed client

cookie_auth.principle: httpOnly cookies ONLY. localStorage is FORBIDDEN for token storage.

server_side.description: SSR loaders MUST use api client (not raw fetch), read cookie from request headers and pass to API
pattern: // In loader - get cookie from request and pass to api client:
wrong: // WRONG - never use createServerFn + raw fetch:

client_side.description: Browser automatically sends cookies with credentials: include. MUST use api client.
pattern: // Client-side - ALWAYS use api client, cookies sent automatically:
// api client is pre-configured with credentials: 'include'

forbidden: ALL localStorage usage - it is banned entirely due to XSS vulnerability
Storing tokens in React state or context
Returning token in API response body - token MUST only be set via Set-Cookie header
Using raw fetch() - ALL API calls MUST use the openapi-fetch client (api.GET, api.POST, etc.)
Using createServerFn for API calls - use loader/beforeLoad with api client instead
Using getCookie() to manually read session tokens - pass cookie header to api client

api_response.principle: Auth API MUST NOT return token in response body. Token is set via httpOnly cookie only.

login_response.description: Login returns user info, NOT the token

register_response.description: Register returns user info, NOT the token

api_response.rationale: If token is in response body, JavaScript can read it, defeating httpOnly protection

patterns.ssr_data: Use loader() to fetch data server-side, access via Route.useLoaderData()
patterns.ssr_auth: Use beforeLoad() to check auth from cookie, redirect if needed
patterns.client_mutations: Use api client directly in event handlers, revalidate with router.invalidate()

openapi_fetch.usage: Type-safe fetch client generated from OpenAPI spec

testing_policy.mandatory: EVERY story MUST include tests. A story is NOT complete without passing tests.
testing_policy.verification: Run 'pnpm test && pnpm test:e2e' before marking any story complete.

data_fetching.ssr: loader() fetches data server-side using api client
data_fetching.access: Route.useLoaderData() in component - data available immediately
data_fetching.mutations: Call api client in handlers, then router.invalidate() to refetch

auth.cookie: httpOnly secure cookie stores session token. localStorage is FORBIDDEN.
auth.ssr_check: beforeLoad() reads cookie from request.headers.get('cookie'), passes to API via headers: { cookie }
auth.client_check: Check loader data for user presence
auth.client_requests: Browser sends cookies automatically with credentials: 'include'. No manual token handling.

code: // Auth check - redirect if not logged in
// SSR: Forward cookie from request to API
headers: { cookie }  // Server needs to forward cookie explicitly
// Client-side: cookies sent automatically via credentials: 'include'

stories.title: Fix ESLint violations: remove localStorage and direct fetch usage
stories.description: Refactor existing code to comply with security and architecture rules. Remove all localStorage usage and replace direct fetch calls with the openapi-fetch api client.
acceptance_criteria: Remove all localStorage usage from login.tsx and register.tsx
Remove all localStorage usage from interceptor.ts
Replace all direct fetch() calls with api client (api.GET, api.POST, etc.)
Update SSR loaders to forward cookie header: headers: { cookie }
Remove all eslint-disable comments for no-direct-fetch rule
ESLint passes with zero errors: pnpm lint
All E2E tests pass after refactoring

files_to_fix: packages/web/src/routes/login.tsx - remove localStorage, cookies handled by server
packages/web/src/routes/register.tsx - remove localStorage, cookies handled by server
packages/web/src/routes/__root.tsx - use api client instead of fetch
packages/web/src/routes/organizations/*.tsx - use api client with cookie header
packages/web/src/routes/organizations/$organizationId/*.tsx - use api client with cookie header

client_mutation: // No token handling needed - cookies sent automatically
const { data, error } = await api.POST('/api/v1/...', { body })

stories.title: Home page / Dashboard
stories.description: Build authenticated home page with navigation to key features.
acceptance_criteria: Unauthenticated: show welcome message with login/register links
Authenticated: show user greeting and quick navigation
Recent activity or quick stats (if available)
Clean, professional design matching accounting application
TESTS (E2E): Home page renders correctly for auth/unauth users

stories.title: Journal entries list with SSR
stories.description: Build journal entries list page with filtering and status display.
acceptance_criteria: loader fetches journal entries for company with pagination
Display entry list: date, reference, description, total amount, status
Filter by status (Draft, Pending, Approved, Posted, Rejected)
Filter by entry type (Standard, Adjusting, Closing, Opening, Reversing)
TESTS (E2E): Journal entries list renders with filters

stories.title: Create journal entry form
stories.description: Build multi-line journal entry creation form with debit/credit validation.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-line entry form with account selector, debit, credit columns
Running totals for debits and credits
Entry date picker with fiscal period validation
Save as draft or submit for approval

stories.title: Journal entry detail and workflow
stories.description: Build journal entry detail page with approval/posting workflow.
acceptance_criteria: Display entry header: date, reference, type, status, created by
Display all line items with account, description, debit, credit
Approve/Reject buttons with comment field (for approvers)
Reverse button for posted entries (creates reversing entry)
Delete button for draft entries only

stories.title: Reports dashboard
stories.description: Build reports landing page with links to all financial reports.
acceptance_criteria: Reports menu with cards for each report type
Trial Balance, Balance Sheet, Income Statement, Cash Flow, Equity Statement
Quick date picker for report period
Last generated date for each report

stories.title: Trial Balance report
stories.description: Build trial balance report viewer with period selection.
acceptance_criteria: Display accounts with debit and credit balances
TESTS (E2E): Trial balance displays correct totals

stories.title: Fiscal calendar view
acceptance_criteria: Display fiscal years with expandable periods (12 months + adjustment)
Period status indicators (Future, Open, Soft Close, Closed, Locked)
TESTS (E2E): Fiscal period status changes work

stories.title: Period close checklist
stories.description: Build period-end close workflow with task checklist.
acceptance_criteria: Checklist of close tasks (reconciliations, accruals, depreciation, etc.)
Block close until required tasks complete
Year-end specific tasks (closing entries, retained earnings)

stories.title: Consolidation groups list
acceptance_criteria: List consolidation groups with parent company and member count

stories.title: Consolidation group detail and members
stories.description: Build consolidation group detail with member management.
acceptance_criteria: Display group info: parent company, reporting currency, status
List member companies with ownership % and consolidation method
Add member company with ownership % and method selector

stories.title: Consolidation run and results
stories.description: Build consolidation run interface with progress and results.
acceptance_criteria: List previous consolidation runs with status and date
Initiate new consolidation run with period/date selection
Progress tracking (translation, aggregation, eliminations, minority interest)
View run results: consolidated trial balance

stories.title: Elimination rules editor
acceptance_criteria: List elimination rules with type, accounts, and status
Filter by elimination type and status
Create rule: type, account selectors, debit/credit accounts

stories.title: Exchange rates manager
acceptance_criteria: List exchange rates with currency pair, rate, type, date
Filter by currency pair and rate type (Spot, Average, Closing)
Rate lookup tool (by date, latest, period average)

stories.title: Intercompany transactions reconciliation
stories.description: Build intercompany transaction tracking and reconciliation interface.
acceptance_criteria: List intercompany transactions with from/to company, amount, status
Filter by company pair and transaction type
Filter by matching status (Matched, Unmatched, Variance Approved)
Link to journal entries (from and to sides)
Dashboard showing unmatched count and variance totals
